content: अपकर्षः {@--1@} ({%a%}) Drawing off or down; diminution, decrease, reduction; मेदोऽपकर्षात् <ls>Dk. 160</ls>; loss, decay, decline, destruction; तेजोपकर्षः <ls>Ve. 1</ls>; deterioration, inferiority; उत्कर्षापकर्षविहीनो मध्यः <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%b%}) Dishonour, degradation, lowering (of esteem), infamy, disgrace (<ab>opp.</ab> उत्कर्ष in all senses); तपोबीजप्रभावैस्तु ते गच्छंति युगे युगे . उत्कर्षं चापकर्षं च मनुष्येष्विह जन्मतः .. <ls>Ms. 10. 42</ls>; मूल्योत्कर्ष° rise and fall in price, increase and decrease. {@--2@} Anticipated performance of a duty, as of a Śrāddha. {@--3@} Anticipation of a word occurring later on (in <ab>gram.</ab>, poetry or Mīmāṃsā &c.).
